project.name: Java XML Validation Collection
project.description:
A collection of JAXP Validators and utility classes, including an uber validator which detects most types of validation and performs ISO/IEC 19757-11:2011 compliant xml-model validation.
Especially note IntrinsicSchemaFactory which can be used to auto detect other SchemaFactories whilst validating a document. IntrinsicSchemaFactory supports xml-model schema association.
